seo.title: OfRoot Landing - Demo

hero.headline: Launch faster with Ofroot
hero.subheadline: Composable landings with static content and optional embeds

features.title: Fast setup
features.text: Deploy static landings instantly on Vercel

features.title: Composable
features.text: Blocks for hero, features, embeds

features.title: Safe
features.text: No secret keys exposed; NEXT_PUBLIC_* only as needed

seo.title: Social Comment + DM Automation - Book More Meetings | OfRoot
seo.description: Automate comment and DM responses, send links, capture lead details, and sync to your CRM so more conversations become booked meetings.

hero.headline: Turn comments and DMs into booked meetings.
hero.subheadline: We build automation that responds to social engagement, sends the right link, captures lead data, and stores it in your CRM with full visibility.

features.title: Auto-reply that feels human
features.text: Respond to comments and DMs with approved templates, routing rules, and safe fallbacks.

features.title: Send links and qualify intent
features.text: Deliver lead magnets, booking links, or next-step questions based on message intent.

features.title: Capture and store lead data
features.text: Collect name, email, phone, and context and store it reliably with dedupe and validation.

features.title: Sync to CRM
features.text: Create or update contacts, set lifecycle stage, assign owners, and trigger follow-up workflows.

features.title: Make and Zapier optional
features.text: Use Make/Zapier when it fits, or ship direct API integrations for reliability and control.

features.title: Track outcomes
features.text: Measure response time, capture rate, qualified lead rate, and meeting conversion.

features.title: Reliability guardrails
features.text: Retries, webhook validation, and monitoring so leads do not drop silently.

seo.title: GPU Rental + Custom LLM Training | OfRoot
seo.description: Rent GPU capacity for labs and teams training custom LLMs. We also clean, structure, and validate your data pipelines so training runs are reliable.

hero.headline: Rent GPU capacity for custom LLM training.
hero.subheadline: We provide GPU compute plus the engineering layer: data cleaning, dataset QA, pipelines, and training run reliability.

features.title: Custom LLM training support
features.text: From dataset prep to training runs, we support the workflows your team needs to ship models safely.

features.title: Data cleaning + sanity checks
features.text: Deduplication, normalization, labeling QA, leakage checks, and reproducible dataset builds.

features.title: Pipelines and reproducibility
features.text: Versioned datasets, configs, and runbooks so results are explainable and repeatable.

features.title: GPU capacity (rental)
features.text: Provision GPU capacity for teams and labs so training does not stall on hardware constraints.

features.title: Training run reliability
features.text: Monitoring, alerting, checkpoints, and failure recovery so long runs do not end in surprises.

features.title: Security and access controls
features.text: Least-privilege access, audit logs, and safe handling for sensitive datasets.
